question:
Which of the following statements is/are correct about the Padhe Bharat Badhe Bharat scheme?
  1. It is a sub-programme under the Sarva Shiksha Abhiyan (SSA)
  2. It focuses on improving the reading comprehension and mathematical performance of children
Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation: The national curriculum framework 2005 clearly pointed out “A majority of children have a sense of fear and failure regarding mathematics. This was also observed as the major reason for early dropouts in schools. To cope with the problem, the HRD ministry started “Padhe Bharat Badhe Bharat” a sub-programme under the Sarva Shiksha Abhiyan. The programme focuses on improving the reading comprehension and mathematical performance of children.
